title: Test HIPAA Compliance
description: In a healthcare organization, a compliance auditor tests adherence to HIPAA privacy and security rules.

tasks.description: Review system access logs to ensure that only authorized clinical staff are accessing patient records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies several instances where administrative staff accessed patient records without a documented medical reason.

tasks.description: Inspect a sample of workstations in patient areas to ensure they are configured to auto-lock after a short period of inactivity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds 5 workstations that do not have screen-lock enabled.

tasks.description: Verify that all laptops containing patient data are encrypted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms that disk encryption is deployed on all company-issued laptops.
